software.name: SLURM
software.description: A workload manager used for running applications on high-performance computing systems.

software.name: Intel MPI
software.description: A high-performance message passing interface (MPI) implementation for Intel processors.

software.name: OpenMP
software.description: An API that supports multi-platform shared memory multiprocessing programming in C, C++, and Fortran.

software.name: gcc
software.description: A compiler used to compile C and C++ code.

software.name: Intel Compiler
software.description: A suite of compilers, libraries, and tools for developing high-performance applications on Intel processors.

software.name: HDF5
software.description: A data model, library, and file format for storing and managing large amounts of data.

software.name: PETSc
software.description: A suite of data structures and routines for the scalable solution of scientific applications modeled by partial differential equations.

resources.name: Peta4-KNL
resources.description: A high-performance computing system featuring Intel Xeon Phi Knights Landing processors.

resources.name: KNL 7210
resources.description: A specific model of Intel Xeon Phi Knights Landing processor with 72 cores.
